text:
Sergi Mingote Moreno (1971 – January 16, 2021) was a Spanish mountaineer and politician. He was also a lecturer at the ESADE. Mingote was born in Parets del Vallès, Spain. He was mayor of Parets del Vallès for the Socialists' Party of Catalonia between 2011 and 2018.
Mingote fell to his death while attempting to climb K2 in Pakistan on January 16, 2021. He was 50.
